A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Honestly I love how the critics\, paid by the business give it a 93% and the people who had to endure this whiny\, boring effort of a movie give it a 56%. People this movie has about 15 minutes of good in it. The rest is entirely missable. Does anyone remember 1977\, the first Star Wars? I saw it with my father\, it was such an excellent movie. 40 years later\, I took my two girls to this one...and I feel we wasted two hours
